txt.en:
After encountering the elusive cave-beast, Skrizug, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

As you inspect Skrizug's foot, you take care not to cut yourself upon the sharp claws of the beast.

You decide to bring this trophy to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards, so that it might be preserved once Gundabad is reclaimed.
Deliver Skrizug's foot to Belga Defthand at Steepset
Belga Defthand can be found at Steepset in MÃ¡ttugard.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Gundabad. You should deliver it to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards.
After encountering the elusive cave-beast, Skrizug, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

'What have you brought me now?'

Belga Defthand inspects Skrizug's foot closely, holding it up to the light at Steepset.

'Ah, this shall make a fine trophy! I shall preserve this rare find. There are many dangerous creatures living in Gundabad. Let us hope fewer creatures trouble us in Gundabad in the days to come!'
